__about__: This file provides stubs for dynamic variables used in HTTP Client
This file serves a documentation purpose and should not be modified manually
Values of this variables are generated at the runtime

uuid.description: This dynamic variable generates a new UUID-v4

timestamp.description: This dynamic variable generates the current Unix timestamp

randomInt.description: This dynamic variable generates a random integer between 0 and 1000

placeholder.description: This dynamic variable marks some segment, that should be replaced by user. Usually tooling adds this variable, when some URL path cannot be recognized.
